Those who have served their Master when the work went hard, who endured poverty and remained faithful when there were few to stand for truth, are to be honored 
                                                                           574
and respected. The Lord desires the younger laborers to gain wisdom, strength, and maturity by association with these faithful men. Let the younger men realize that in having such workers among them they are highly favored. Let them give them an honored place in their councils.
